CustomField.formula: (CASE(Frequency_Picklist__c, "112 Days", (Service_Price_Per_Visit__c*3)/12, "120 Days", (Service_Price_Per_Visit__c*3)/12, "14 Days", (Service_Price_Per_Visit__c*26)/12, "168 Days", (Service_Price_Per_Visit__c*2)/12, "182 Days", (Service_Price_Per_Visit__c*2)/12, "28 Days", (Service_Price_Per_Visit__c*13)/12, "2X Per Week", (Service_Price_Per_Visit__c*104)/12, "2X Per Year", (Service_Price_Per_Visit__c*2)/12, "3X Per Week", (Service_Price_Per_Visit__c*156)/12, "42 Days", (Service_Price_Per_Visit__c*9)/12, "56 Days", (Service_Price_Per_Visit__c*6.5)/12, "5X Per Week", (Service_Price_Per_Visit__c*260)/12, "6X Per Week", (Service_Price_Per_Visit__c*312)/12, "84 Days", (Service_Price_Per_Visit__c*4)/12, "Annually", (Service_Price_Per_Visit__c*1)/12, "Bi-Monthly", (Service_Price_Per_Visit__c*6)/12, "Daily", (Service_Price_Per_Visit__c*364)/12, "Fixed Weekly", (Service_Price_Per_Visit__c*52)/12, "Monthly", (Service_Price_Per_Visit__c*12)/12, "One-Time", (Service_Price_Per_Visit__c*1)/12, "Quarterly", (Service_Price_Per_Visit__c*4)/12, "Semi-Annually", (Service_Price_Per_Visit__c*2)/12, "Twice Monthly", (Service_Price_Per_Visit__c*24)/12, "Weekly", (Service_Price_Per_Visit__c*52)/12, 0) )
CustomField.label: Monthly Price Per Unit
